hero.name: Abdallah Noor
hero.title: Software Engineer
hero.description: I build exceptional digital experiences using the latest technologies. Specialized in creating software systems for individuals and startups.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Here you will find more information about me, what I do, and my current skills.
about.description1: A software engineer specializing in building modern web applications. I work with individuals and startups to transform their ideas into successful digital products.
about.description2: My experience includes front-end development, designing interactive user interfaces, and building scalable systems with a focus on security and performance.
